EmailTemplate.description: Notification when SLA for a Franchise is breached on a Shipment level for In-Country Transit Time
EmailTemplate.name: SLA violation - In-Country Transit Time
EmailTemplate.subject: SLA Violation for shipment - [{!Airway_Shipment__c.Name}] Invoice - [{!Airway_Shipment__c.Invoice_Number_Range__c}] Day -[{!Airway_Shipment__c.In_cntry_trans_eml_cntr__c}]
